header.rec_loc: Kitchen in a shared House in Finchley London; all speakers’ home.
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Slimming World Healthy Extra options, free food and ‘syns’ in various foods, tea, the cooking, 0 calorie syrup, artificial flavour, making plans for ‘treat day’ Saturday, Siri, calendars, cauliflower cheese with a roast, weight loss, unreliable scales, exercise, Supermarkets feeling best Quorn range, veg box deliveries, saving money, tax, work, targets, spice mix, double peas in the freezer, frylight, mint.
header.activity: Best friends and Housemates talking while cooking dinner no.1.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, complaining, advising, anecdote telling, making arrangements
